description:
Neferpitou (ネフェルピトー), also known as "Pitou" (ピトー), is a cat-humanoid Chimera Ant and the firstborn of the Royal Guards. Androgynous in appearance, Pitou is one of the first Chimera Ants to fully utilize Nen with enough skill to be recognized by even Netero as a superior combatant. Pitou shows a knack for medical/surgical procedures, prodding and manipulating Pokkle`s brain in order to have the human divulge everything he knows about Nen to the Ants.He is a Specialist-type of Nen user.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Neferpitou
